comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
1.  Get page that says, attach source
2.  Attach the source
The source appears for a micro-instant and then disappears.
I think it's related to this error in the error log.
Please fix - it's always when I wwant to debug something I can't even view the source and step through the code.
